Text:
I thought this remake was put on the back burner,  is this for real?
http://ca.ign.com/articles/2012/05/16/square-final-fantasy-vii-remake-not-a-priority
This is actually just a re-release with a little bit of updated content (achievements, etc.) not a full fledged remake.
when i hit play  the program just flashes back to the same screen and does nothing?
